attributes.action: To allow hair & beauty salons to remain open during any COVID-19 Lockdowns.
attributes.additional_details: To allow Hairdressers & Beauty Salons to remain open during future COVID-19 Lockdowns
attributes.background:
I feel hair & beauty salons should remain open as an essential business in any future COVID-19 lockdowns.

As the government has branded salons as personnel care.  SAGE research shows Hairdressers & Beauty salons contribute only 0,05% to the R rate, its shown to be worthy of staying open safely.
